file_insights.method_description: Find an item by name prefix match with optional predicate filter

patterns_discovered: Optional predicate filtering in search method
Early return pattern for first matching item
gotchas_discovered: Name matching uses indexOf(search) === 0, which implies prefix matching
Predicate is optional but can filter out matched items

approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Directly add method to existing class

recommendations: Consider adding type hints or TypeScript for better type safety
Add unit tests to validate find() method behavior
Consider performance implications of linear search for large collections
